title: These upcoming phones will utilize Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 and 7 Gen 1 processors
content:
After months of rumors, Qualcomm finally took the wraps off of its latest chipsets, the Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 and the Snapdragon 7 Gen 1. While Qualcomm did announce some of its partners that will take advantage of its new hardware, more details are starting to emerge, with companies shedding light on the products they will

The post These upcoming phones will utilize Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 and 7 Gen 1 processors appeared first on XDA.
description: Qualcomm announced the Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 and Snapdragon 7 Gen 1. These are some of the handsets that will utilize the new processors.
